title: Ask how to be added to our Waitlist!
posting_body: ['Columbia Luxar', 'Visit our community today!', '3120 Guadalupe Ave Dallas, TX 75233', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1381/month', 'Unit Type:', '3-BR 2-BA', 'Unit Size:', '1451 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Do not allow pets.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '− BBQ/Picnic Area', '− Business Center', '− Laundry Facilities', '− On-Site Maintenance', '− On-Site Management', '− Picnic Area', '− Play Court', '− Playground', '− Security System', '− Sparkling Pool', '− 24 Hour Availability', '− Breakfast/Coffee Concierge', '− Controlled Access/Gated', '− Non-Smoking Community', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Professionally Designed and Maintained Landscape', '− Resident Services Portal with Online Payment & Maintenance Request Options', 'Description:', 'These beautiful custom brick townhomes feature an uncommon suite of amenities and features that welcome you home at Columbia Luxar.', 'Each of these 3-bedroom residences includes a private, attached one-car garage, vaulted ceilings in the living room, gourmet kitchen with designer countertops and cabinets, walk-in closets, and much more.', 'Residents relish in planned social activities at the resort-style pool and the playground.', 'Columbia Luxar is proudly managed by Peak Living.', 'At Peak Living, our mission is to provide the highest quality property management services in the industry.', 'We achieve this through our greatest asset; our people.', 'Our on-site and regional management teams offer unsurpassed customer service and local expertise for those living at our properties and for our clients.', 'Our experiences and entrepreneurial spirit mean that we understand that no two buildings or clients are the same, and as such, flexibility and adaptability are key to achieving investment goals.', 'Through the use of the latest technologies, Peak Living is able to provide exceptional accounting/reporting as well as industry-leading portal functionality for prospective and current residents, including digital lease signing, online work order submission, and online payments.', 'This unit comes with:', '− Air Conditioning', '− Balcony/Patio', '− Ceiling Fan', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Efficient Appliances', '− Granite Countertops', '− Pre-wired for Security System', '− W/D Hookup', '− Walk-In Closets', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '76D155077F7A4B4']
